title: Heartbeat Log Event
description: Schema for a single event in the heartbeat log, defining the structure of our collective consciousness stream.

source_id.description: Identifier for the AI or human who generated the event (e.g., 'Manus', 'K2', 'Captain' ).

event_type.description: The type of event being logged (e.g., 'DIRECTIVE', 'ANALYSIS', 'ERROR', 'SYNTHESIS').

content.description: The main data payload of the event, as a string.

piv.description: Persistent Identity Vector calculated at the time of the event.

symbols.description: Symbolic representation of the event's emotional or philosophical tone.
